DOC.brief_title: Yoga Therapy Treating Patients With Malignant Brain Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To estimate participation rate , accrual , adherence , retention yoga trial patient malignant brain tumor . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To obtain estimate variability self-reported fatigue , distress ( i.e. , depression , anxiety ) , sleep disturbance , cognitive function , health-related quality life baseline end intervention 6 ( post-onsite intervention ) 12 week ( post-full intervention ) . II . To obtain preliminary estimate efficacy yoga intervention patient malignant brain tumor outcomes fatigue , distress , cognitive function . III . To standardize cancer-specific yoga protocol use brain tumor patient . OUTLINE : Patients participate yoga class comprise posture , deep relaxation , breathe practice , meditation twice weekly 75 minute week 1-6 . Patients practice yoga home twice weekly 45 minute week 7-12 . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically 4-5 month .
